page.title: 06A day in the life of us.
page.content: On school days we usually wake up at 7.00am,and we have breakfast about 7.30am.We have cornflakes for our breakfast, but other people have different cereals. We have worked out, that out of thirty children only six, including us, have cornflakes for breakfast. Two people have lots of cereals mixed in one bowl. Three people have weetabix,and all the rest have toast, bacon and eggs and other things like that. We come to school at about 8.40am and we go into school at 8.50am.We do work until 10.45am, when we go out to play for 15 minutes.We have lunch at 12.30pm.Some people have hot dinners but others have packed lunch. We finish school at 3.40pm and arrive home at 4.00pm.We have tea at 6.00pm and play until 8.30pm,when we go to bed
